name: Tap Tap Limbo - a Simple and Addictive Game by AppVenturous!
name_original: Tap Tap Limbo - a Simple and Addictive Game by AppVenturous!
description:
How low can you limbo??

Tap Tap Limbo is a simple, addictive game that is fun to play and FREE!!

It is easy to pick up and play, but very tough to master!

Maneuver under the limbo bars, but don't lean back so far that you fall down!!

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

✓ Simple and addictive
✓ Easy 1-touch controls
✓ Awesome graphics
✓ 4 worlds with 80 unique levels
✓ Fun to play for hours

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
